TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Mark_Blount, title = Mark_Blount, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mark_Blount} }

S.FORM: Mark Blount siwkay niza tatama a tedemaw ciniza, lumeniay ku banges, nalecuhan i 11 a bulad 30 a demiad, 1975 a mihcaan, Mark Blount, u miunduay ciniza.
Mark Bloont siwkay niza tatama a tedemaw ciniza, lomeniay ko banges, nalecohan i 11 a bolad 30 a demiad, 1975 a mihcaan, Mark Bloont, o miondoay ciniza.
